title: I’M Raising A Man In A Different World: The Divine Doctor, Miss Jiu
alternative_title: ESTOY CRIANDO A UN HOMBRE EN UN MUNDO DIFERENTE, LA DOCTORA GENIO, JUN JIU / 我在异界养男神·神医九小姐 / 我在异界养男神：神医九
status: ESTOY CRIANDO A UN HOMBRE EN UN MUNDO DIFERENTE, LA DOCTORA GENIO, JUN JIU / 我在异界养男神·神医九小姐 / 我在异界养男神：神医九
description:
Description :
        Jun Jiu, the Huaxia magic hand, excelled both in medicine and poison. After the time leap, she virtually became a trash that anyone could humiliate. A trash? She's good at everything! She beats jerks up in the face, makes powerful elixirs with ease, owns a mythical beast, And sleeps with the emperor at night! So now who's that trash?
